pages.text: After obtaining a $(l)Vault Rock$() you need to convert it to a $(l)Vault Crystal$() by infusing it with the requested items on the $(l)Vault Altar$().
Place the Vault Rock on the Vault Altar and feed it with the requested items. The number of requested items $(l)increases$() when your $(l)Vault Level$() increases. $(br2)

After completing the request, feed the Vault Altar a $(l)Redstone Signal$() to obtain the $(l)Vault Crystal$(). $(br2)The $(l)Objective, Theme and Layout$() of the Vault Crystal will not be revealed, but can be set using $(l)Seals, Motes and Catalysts.$() The Level of the Vault Crystal is sealed to the Vault Level when it was crafted.
The level of The Vault Crystal is scaled to your Vault Level when the crystal was created. To $(l)downgrade$() the Vault's level, infuse it with a diamond in an anvil.
